output_list.reason: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
Integer overflow in burnFrom function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
buy function does not check call return value, allowing a potential trap for the buyer.
sell function does not check call return value, allowing a potential trap for the seller.
transferFrom function allows asset theft due to incorrect access control for the 'allowance' variable.
